text: ituve (muraiyakum.) Melum allahvin punitamana kattalaikalai yar menmaippatuttukiraro atu avarukku, avarutaiya iraivanitattil cirantatakum; innum narkal piranikalil unkalukku (akatavaiyena) otappattatait tavira (marravai) unkalukku anumatikkappattullana akave vikkirakankalin acucattattiliruntu ninkal vilakik kollunkal. Anriyum poyyana collaiyum ninkal vilakik kollunkal
